pageContext.claim: “I have, you know, hundreds of millions of people. Number one on Facebook. Did you know I was number one on Facebook? I mean, I just found out I'm number one on Facebook.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. Trump's personal Facebook page at the time had around 27 million fans, while former President Barack Obama's page has nearly twice as many. Meanwhile, actor Vin Diesel has almost 100 million fans.
